--- title: "데이터 문해력과 디지털 글쓰기" subtitle: "빛에듀(Bit-Edu)" author: "이광춘 / 한국 R 사용자회" date: "2022-12-02" lang: kr format: revealjs: theme: ["theme/q-theme.scss"] width: 1280 height: 720 chalkboard: buttons: false preview-links: auto logo: fig/koRea_logo.png footer: "[한국 R 사용자회](https://r2bit.com/) " code-copy: true center-title-slide: true code-link: true code-overflow: wrap highlight-style: a11y smaller: true scrollable: false slide-number: c/t code-tools: source: true toggle: false caption: none filters: - lightbox lightbox: auto execute: eval: true echo: true freeze: true editor_options: chunk_output_type: console knitr: opts_chunk: echo: true collapse: true comment: "#>" --- # 현재 상황 ## 요약 ![](fig/04_now.gif) ## 글쓰기 패러다임 ![](fig/data-conference-three-languages.png){fig-align="center"} ## 글쓰기 도구 ![](../202210-hongik-v2/fig/markdown-writing.png){fig-align="center"} ## 문서 결과물 ![](../202210-hongik-v2/fig/single-sourcing-publishing.jpg){fig-align="center"} # 도전과 응전 ## 쿼토 (Quarto) ![](../202210-hongik-v2/fig/horst_quarto_schematic.png){fig-align="center"} ## 문서 복잡성 ![](../202210-hongik-v2/fig/quarto-unification.png){fig-align="center"} ## 문서 공장 ![](fig/quarto-factory.gif) ## 문서 저작 미래

![](fig/05_future_devops.gif){fig-align="center" width="696"} # {background-image="../202210-hongik-v2/fig/slide-end.png" background-size="contain"}

include-after-body:
<script>
  // htmlwidgets need to know to resize themselves when slides are shown/hidden.
  // Fire the "slideenter" event (handled by htmlwidgets.js) when the current
  // slide changes (different for each slide format).
  (function () {
    // dispatch for htmlwidgets
    function fireSlideEnter() {
      const event = window.document.createEvent("Event");
      event.initEvent("slideenter", true, true);
      window.document.dispatchEvent(event);
    }

    function fireSlideChanged(previousSlide, currentSlide) {
      fireSlideEnter();

      // dispatch for shiny
      if (window.jQuery) {
        if (previousSlide) {
          window.jQuery(previousSlide).trigger("hidden");
        }
        if (currentSlide) {
          window.jQuery(currentSlide).trigger("shown");
        }
      }
    }

    // hookup for slidy
    if (window.w3c_slidy) {
      window.w3c_slidy.add_observer(function (slide_num) {
        // slide_num starts at position 1
        fireSlideChanged(null, w3c_slidy.slides[slide_num - 1]);
      });
    }

  })();
</script>
